name: Incredible Office Worker Takahata Tetsuo
description:
You play as Takahata Tetsuo. He's an extremely good worker, lover and friend.
But being him is not an easy task!
Do your work, don't miss any invites to company parties and don't let your rival steal your girl!

My uni project for 2nd module
Game has no end cutscenes and sometimes is extremely buggy
But if you win youll get a frog pic

im not sure if im going to update it soon but you can try it out the way it is now
